archimate:Node.name: Virtual Vault
archimate:Node.documentation: The collection of all Vaults used by an Entity. For example, the Virtual Vault for an Individual Identity Owner would include the Vaults on all that personâ€™s devices, plus any cloud-based Vaults that are accessible to and/or managed by the Identity Ownerâ€™s Agent(s). See also Sovereign Domain.
